name: LEGO Island 2: The Brickster's Revenge
description:
LEGO Island 2: The Brickster's Revenge is an arcade game developed by Crawfish Interactive and Silicon Dreams Studio. It came out on 30-03-2001. Lego Software published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play LEGO Island 2: The Brickster's Revenge on Game Boy Color, PlayStation, PC and Game Boy Advance.
